summary: Frontend single-page view and code input were added with a console-like Tailwind theme, but the headline does not match the exact required text string and several non-goal/constraint-violating additions were introduced (authentication hooks/provider, backend file, and extra UI/footer).

missing_requirements.requirement: Display the exact text "Bytes console winning!" in very large, prominent letters at the top/center of the page.
missing_requirements.reason: The headline is split across multiple spans/lines ("Bytes" / "console" / "winning!") rather than rendering the exact single string "Bytes console winning!" as written, and the layout centers the headline vertically rather than placing it at the top/center.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/used Internet Identity authentication context and actor hooks (authentication-related code and provider wrapping the app).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists "No authentication (Internet Identity)" as a non-goal and also constrains changes to those hook files; diff introduces these files/usages anyway.
BuildRequest states backend changes are not required and requests not to add unnecessary backend features.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer with external attribution link to caffeine.ai.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in requirements/non-goals; introduces extra content beyond headline + code entry UI.
